name: Snake plant
sunlight_care: prefers bright light, can survive in lower light

name: Ceriman or Swiss cheese plant
sunlight_care: bright to medium indirect light, good light or shade, keep out of direct sunlight

name: Pothos
sunlight_care: lower light and dry air make conditins less than ideal

name: Darcaena
sunlight_care: easily adapts to different light environments, best kept away from direct sun

name: ZZ Plant
watering_tips: watering once a month during growing season (spring & summer), once every two months during its dorman season (fall)

name: Spider Plant
sunlight_care: bright light but no direct sun. Perfect to put in a room with big windows

name: Rubber Tree
sunlight_care: needs bright light can take some partial sunlight
watering_tips: during growing season (summer) the plant should be kept moist. This includes wiping the leaves with a damp cloth or even misting them. During dormant season the rubber tree plant may only need water once or twice a month

name: Birds Nest Fern
sunlight_care: thrives in medium indirect light and a humd environment. Does great in a bathroom with a shower with a window that receives natural light
watering_tips: water every 1-2 weeks. Expect to water more often in brighter light and less often in lower light

name: Peace Lily
sunlight_care: place in bright but shady spot
watering_tips: water about once a week and spritz leaves with water throughout the summer will keep your peace lily hydrated

name: Philodendron Green
sunlight_care: medium light and bright indirect sunlight
watering_tips: every 1-2 weeks, allowing soil to dry out between waterings. Increase frequency with increased light

name: Aloe Vera
sunlight_care: put in a bright sunny spot
watering_tips: once a week during warmer months, once every 2 weeks in winter

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
sunlight_care: grows best with consistent, bright, filtered light. Turn the plant every few months once it begins to lean towards the light. It wil prefer an east facing, sunny window as afternoon sun from a south or west facing window will be too strong and will burn the leaves.
watering_tips: once a week or every 10 days

name: Elephant Ear
sunlight_care: a large amount of filtered sunlight is preferable

name: Peperomia
sunlight_care: best in bright, indirect sunlight. An east or west facing window sill is ideal for them at most times of the year
watering_tips: does best when watered from the root. Sit in a pan of water for a few minutes every 7 to 10 days

name: Chinese Money Plant
sunlight_care: loves access to bright light but not direct sunlight. Light shade encourages larger leaves to grow
watering_tips: deeply water once a week and allow the top 2-3 inches of the soil to dry between waterings
